text: pretty cool until you realize those historic sites lack proper preservation 😅
peer deeper than just old maps - even daily stuff back then has wild stories! ever think how our street food faves might've been ages ago? bet they got some tales too 🤟🏽
even regular streets got untold sagas - we tend overlook'em!
ever heard of leaving work at office? 🙄
"hitting big 3-0? add 'find stable career path' posters all over 😂"

seriously though? tech feels like utopia compared - pr world still stuck playing catch-up cuz "is she aggressive enough?" gets tossed around too often 🙄 strategy? outshine and out-network them all day every day
client schmooze fests still expect women in heels - exhausting!
